title: YouTube Channel Scraper Input
description: Configure the YouTube Channel Scraper to extract channel information and social media links

startUrls.title: Channel URLs
startUrls.description: List of YouTube channel URLs to scrape. Supports both @username and /channel/ID formats
startUrls.sectionDescription: Provide YouTube channel URLs to scrape

keywords.title: Search Keywords
keywords.description: Search for channels by keywords (alternative to providing direct URLs). Note: May have limitations due to YouTube search API changes

limit.title: Search Results Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of channels to return per keyword search
limit.sectionDescription: Control how many results to return

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: Max Total Requests
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Maximum total number of pages to process in this run

requestHandlerTimeoutSecs.title: Page Load Timeout (seconds)
requestHandlerTimeoutSecs.description: Maximum time to wait for each channel page to load

maxRequestRetries.title: Max Request Retries
maxRequestRetries.description: Number of times to retry failed requests before giving up

minConcurrency.title: Min Concurrent Requests
minConcurrency.description: Minimum number of pages to process in parallel

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrent Requests
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum number of pages to process in parallel. Higher values are faster but may trigger rate limits

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy or custom proxies to avoid rate limiting and blocks. Recommended for reliable scraping.
